description: Try our easy to follow Classic Mint Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Classic Mint Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch mint, leaves removed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place mint, sugar and 1/2 cup boiling water in a jug. Stir until sugar dissolves. Add vinegar. Season. Stir until combined.
Cover and chill for 30 minutes to allow flavours to infuse. Serve with lamb.
